plot: Peyton Jennings, an aspiring police cadet, knows he is ready for his first day of field training. But what he does not know is that he is about to be forced into an unthinkable hostage situation before he even exits the door.
title: Cadet
plot_es: Peyton Jennings, an aspiring police cadet, knows he is ready for his first day of field training. But what he does not know is that he is about to be forced into an unthinkable hostage situation before he even exits the door.
plot_en: Peyton Jennings, an aspiring police cadet, knows he is ready for his first day of field training. But what he does not know is that he is about to be forced into an unthinkable hostage situation before he even exits the door.
